snippet.title: Guild Saga: Vanished Worlds Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Guild Saga: Vanished Worlds is a fantasy RPG with classic, turn-based combat featuring over a hundred skills and thousands of unique items. Create and customize your own character and experience the game's branching story, or put your tactical prowess to the test in the vicious Gauntlet Mode.

COMING SOON TO STEAM 

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2184350/

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/GuildSagaVW
